00007 class XmlSetCredentials extends Plugin implements IInputPlugin {
00008 
00009     public function run(Request $oRequest) {
00010         $oXml = simplexml_load_string($oRequest->getBody());
00011         if (!empty($oXml)) {
00012 
00013             // sometimes 'LoginUsername' and sometimes 'Username'
00014             if (!empty($oXml->LoginUsername)) {
00015                 $oXml->LoginUsername = 'bas.vangaalen@tomtom.com';
00016             } else if (!empty($oXml->Username)) {
00017                 $oXml->Username = 'bas.vangaalen@tomtom.com';
00018             }
00019

00021             $oRequest->setBody($oXml->asXML());

00023             throw new PluginException('Unable to load XML');
00024         }
